description: The Crown retains rights to negotiate, documents can be submitted in official language
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Notice ID**: PW-22-01010034

**Title (English)**: Enclosed Cargo Trailer

**Title (French)**: Remorque fermée

**Opening Date**: November 17, 2022

**Closing Date and Time**: December 7, 2022, 00:00:00 hours

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-236658/A

**Contracting Entity**:
* Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**:
* Name: Victor Shepstone
* Email: victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3040

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply of an Enclosed Cargo Trailer and related items in accordance with the Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR. 

The contract objective is to acquire one (1) unit of the specified trailer and related items, for delivery on or before 120 days after contract award.

**Pre-Qualification**
---------------------

To participate in this bid solicitation process, suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR.

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding the required SA.

**Key Information**
----------------------

* Notice duration: 15 calendar days
* Delivery period: on or before 120 days ARO
* No security requirement associated with this requirement
* Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please refer to the [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996) website for further information on the pre-qualification process.
